> As she and her companion walk back toward the base, Empath sees the 
> tiger-bot and recognizes the mind that directs it.  "Maxima?" she 
> calls.  "How in the blazes did you get here?"  The femme leaves 
> Windlord's side and runs over to her fellow Decepticon.  Unlike 
> Maxima, Empath looks much like her original Seeker self.  (I doubt 
> Maxima would forget Skywarp's old girlfriend.)
> 

She twisted around in her transorganic form to see a Seeker. Her 
optics narrowed as it took a moment to register, her transorganic 
mind not as sharp as her totally metallic meta processor. But the 
voice & form was familiar enough. A Seeker. She knew what they were & 
how they were used & why. She had been at odds with Starscream for 
some time. But the others, especially Skywarp & Thundercracker she 
had deemed them to be good comrades. 

She smirked evilly, sometimes a trait that she had when she had some 
plans in mind. "Well, a Seeker. Empath, if I am correct."

Then she was serious. "I hope you haven't turned Autobot on us?" If 
empath was still a Decepticon & a good Seeker as she was or currently 
is on Cybertron, then she could be trusted with what Maxima had in 
mind.
